======================
Fluid Rendering Engine
======================

:Package name:
    typo3fluid/fluid

:Version:
    |release|

:Language:
    en

:Author:
    Claus Due, Sebastian Kurf√ºrst, Karsten Dambekalns, Robert Lemke & Fluid
    contributors

:License:
    This document is published under the
    `Creative Commons BY 4.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/>`__
    license.

:Rendered:
    |today|

----

Fluid is a PHP template engine and is the de facto standard for any HTML-based
output in the TYPO3 CMS. However, it is not dependent on TYPO3 and can be used
in any PHP project.

If using Fluid in combination with TYPO3 CMS, a look at the documentation of
:doc:`ext_fsc:Index` can be worth a look.
